author: felicity
msg: fix more rule hitting itself issues...

author: felicity
msg: bug 1890: spamassassin now uses ArchiveIterator.  This lets us do things like 'spamassassin -d --mbox file1' and have the functionality go over the entire mbox file.  same for checks, adding to white/black-lists, etc.

author: felicity
msg: if we're looking at messages that aren't specified as spam or ham, message_array gets confused.  so default to ham.
